title: Mystery at Cranberry Farm
description: The Fern children were resigned to summer in a small Vancouver apartment, while their Father studied at the university. Then came a letter from Aunt Daisy and everything changed. Suddenly Tory, Tritch, and Teddy were off to a farm in the Okanagan Valley.... and to a ninety year-old mystery!A story - a book of clues - a surly housekeeper - mysterious happenings at night - danger! How Tory, Tritch, and Teddy approach the mystery at Cranberry Farm will keep readers in suspense throughout this novel.
author: Lynn Manuel
